title: Finding Fair and Efficient Allocations
description: Fair and efficient allocation of $m$ indivisible goods among $n$ agents with additive valuations.
results: Theorem 1: EF1+PO in $O(\textrm{poly}(m, n, v_{\max}))$ time, where $v_{\max} := \max_{i,j} v_i(j)$.
Theorem 3: Polytime 1.45-approximation to Nash welfare maximization.
